metadata.name: File::Acl
metadata.description:
File Access Control List

Represents a File’s Access Control List.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.readers.each { |reader| puts reader }

metadata.name: reload!
metadata.description: Reloads all Access Control List data for the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.reload!

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.owners.each { |owner| puts owner }

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.writers.each { |writer| puts writer }

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.readers.each { |reader| puts reader }

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
email = "heidi@example.net"
file.acl.add_owner "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
email = "authors@example.net"
file.acl.add_owner "group-#{email}"

params.name: generation
params.description:
When present, selects a specific revision
of this object. Default is the latest version.

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
email = "heidi@example.net"
file.acl.add_writer "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
email = "authors@example.net"
file.acl.add_writer "group-#{email}"

params.name: generation
params.description:
When present, selects a specific revision
of this object. Default is the latest version.

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
email = "heidi@example.net"
file.acl.add_reader "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
email = "authors@example.net"
file.acl.add_reader "group-#{email}"

params.name: generation
params.description:
When present, selects a specific revision
of this object. Default is the latest version.

metadata.name: delete
metadata.description: Permanently deletes the entity from the file’s access control list.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
email = "heidi@example.net"
file.acl.delete "user-#{email}"

params.name: generation
params.description:
When present, selects a specific revision
of this object. Default is the latest version.

metadata.name: auth!
metadata.description: Convenience method to apply the authenticatedRead predefined ACL rule to the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.auth!

metadata.name: owner_full!
metadata.description: Convenience method to apply the bucketOwnerFullControl predefined ACL rule to the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.owner_full!

metadata.name: owner_read!
metadata.description: Convenience method to apply the bucketOwnerRead predefined ACL rule to the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.owner_read!

metadata.name: private!
metadata.description: Convenience method to apply the private predefined ACL rule to the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.private!

metadata.name: project_private!
metadata.description: Convenience method to apply the projectPrivate predefined ACL rule to the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.project_private!

metadata.name: public!
metadata.description: Convenience method to apply the publicRead predefined ACL rule to the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.public!
